mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs VALUES(bbs_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, #{category})
mapper.select: SELECT ARTICLENUM, ID, TITLE, HIT, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITEDATE, TO_CHAR(UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS updateDate, category FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, b.* FROM (SELECT ARTICLENUM, ID, TITLE, HIT, WRITEDATE, updateDate, category FROM bbs) b WHERE category=#{category}) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{startRow} + 9
